clusterList.phrase: i said what's the scariest moment of your life
i wasn't scared until after i knew the severity
we were very afraid for the kids we were scared and i'm very happy
this is the first time that my family has experienced anything like this

it was also nostalgic for me my mom was very active in this area until her death in 1997 she would have been very joyful had she been around this is a realization of her dreams and many others it was truly a remarkable moment and moving experience for me
i don't think i've ever really done anything really scary
i was in bed when i heard the thump and thought what the hell is that i wasn't frightened i didn't even realise the damage that had been done until a neighbour came out to tell me

it was pretty scary for everybody
